p:
The plant materials and methods used (see hereafter) were available upon request. All data obtained have been included into the manuscript.
Data scope and typeDatabase
Identification of chemical substance peaksNational Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)-11-2013(http://www.nist.gov/srd/upload/NIST1a11Ver2-0Man.pdf)
Protocols of testing of antimicrobial activities by agar-diffusion methodClinical and Laboratory Standards Institute, USA(http://ncipd.org/control/images/NCIPD_docs/CLSI_M100-S24.pdf)
Protocols for determination of antiradical activityInternational Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry Division(http://www.bashanfoundation.org/shela/shelaiupac.pdf)
